author: psmith
msg: Fixed a bug found by Joshua ChaitinPollack where LoggingEvents were being posted to the matching
log4j Logger without obeying the configured thresholds defined for that logger.
This is inline with what the Receiver class does.
Added test case based on test harness code provided by Joshua, slightly massaged to fit

author: ruwan
msg: We were using a deprecated class of Axis2 which is Callback and the option that they have provided now is the AxisCallback. I have removed the deprecated stuff from our code and incoperated the AxisCallback instead of Callback (I have tested about 12 samples which I thought is going to be affected if there is something wrong, they were working fine :D)

author: woonsan
msg: Fixed a trivial build problem on Java 1.4.
Integer.reverseBytes(int) was replaced with full bitwise operations.

author: gawor
msg: with recent KeyedCollection OpenEJB changes we must set the reference name before it is added to the collection since the underlying collection uses the reference name as a key in the map
